alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 7:47PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Pima and western Cochise Counties through 830 PM MST... At 746 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Saguaro National Park East to 10 miles northeast of Vail to near Benson. Movement was west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tucson, Benson, Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, Casas Adobes, Drexel Heights, Flowing Wells, Tanque Verde, Vail, South Tucson, East Sahuarita, Sabino Canyon Recreation Area, Summit, Catalina Foothills, Corona De Tucson, Tucson International Airport, Saguaro National Park East, Saguaro National Park West, Tucson Estates, Rita Ranch and Mescal. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 251 and 305. Interstate 19 between mile markers 54 and 63. Route 77 between mile markers 70 and 73. Route 80 between mile markers 293 and 296. Route 83 between mile markers 45 and 58. Route 86 between mile markers 166 and 171. Route 90 between mile markers 290 and 293. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
